DOC.brief_summary: This prospective observational study aim identify intraoperative variable predict hemodynamic change accord intra-abdominal pressure child undergo laparoscopic surgery . The intraoperative variable include Pulse pressure variation ( PPV ) , systolic pressure variation ( SPV ) , stoke volume variation ( SVV ) , Pulse oximeter plethysmographic waveform amplitude ( â–³POP ) , pleth variability index ( PVI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Predictive Variables Hemodynamic Effect During Laparoscopic Surgery Children
DOC.criteria: Pediatric patient undergo laparoscopic surgery know arrhythmia know lung disease know cardiac dysfunction ( Ejection fraction le 30 % )
